services.title: Trim & Cut
services.text: Avada Barbers are experts in the lickety split trim and hari cut. Quick but careful and ridiculously good looking.

services.title: Wash & Dry
services.text: Take a seat in our fine leather chairs, lean back and let us lather you a fresh head in a luxurious fashion.

services.title: Beard Tidy
services.text: Tame the tangles and untidy facial hairs like a gentleman with our Beard Tidy services from Avada Barbers.
